name: Holiday Jigsaw Easter
description:
The warmth of a cozy hearth, a family holiday dinner, children's laughter and cute pets. All of this awaits you in a new Holiday Jigsaw! 500 amazing and pleasant Easter pictures!

- The amazing family Easter Holidays!
- 500 unique pictures and over 10 hours of game-play!
- Well designed game-play.
- Save your progress at any time!
- Tasks and colorful trophies for those who love excitement!
- A game with an Easter theme!
